pages.text: $(o)The Watcher, one who shall not dream, argues with The Dreamer, chained to The Watcher himself.$(br2)$(l)W:$()You take your steps in dreams, yet you step further. $(br)$(l)D:$()What I seek lies beneath the skin, and so do dreams. Come and join me, though it'll drive us insane!
$(l)W:$()Don't you see that your sanity keeps you walking on these grounds?
